com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g3d.physics.collision

Class CollisionBody3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g3d.physics.collision.CollisionBody3D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class CollisionBody3D
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    A basic JBullet 3D collision object.
    Author:
    David Jerzak (RivelBop)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private com.badlogic.gdx.physics.bullet.collision.btCollisionObject BODY

      The collision shape dimensions/information.

      The collision dispatcher, takes in the configuration.
      private Shape3D SHAPE
      The shape model used for collision dimensions, transformations, and rendering.

        public void update()

      • isColliding

        public boolean isColliding(CollisionBody3D otherBody)
        Checks to see if the provided collision body collides with the BODY.
        Parameters:
        otherBody - The collision body to check with.
        Returns:
        True if the number of contacts between the bodies is greater than 0.

        Returns:
        True if the number of contacts between the bodies is greater than 0.

        Returns:
